ing: 1 (9 ounce) package BUITONIÂ® Refrigerated Angel Hair Pasta
2 tablespoons lemon juice, or more to taste
n: Angel Hair Pasta with Lemon and Chicken (Lighter)
des: "The fresh flavor burst of lemon perfectly accents the chicken and angel hair pasta in this quick and easy dish. Serve with a generous topping of Parmesan cheese and a tossed green salad."
ins:
Prepare pasta according to package directions.
Toss pasta with chicken, oil, butter, lemon juice, parsley, marjoram and garlic powder. Season with salt and ground black pepper, if desired.
